com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface IButtonRenderer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type representing state of button
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IButtonRendererProxy<T>, ISwitchRenderer<T>, ISwitchRendererProxy<T>

    public interface IButtonRenderer<T>
    Interface abstracting the rendering of a button.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the default height.
